name: OpenTok-Green-Screen
description: A green screen demo based on OpenTok.

opentok__api_key.description: An API key provided by opentok

opentok__api_secret.description: An API secret provided by opentok

app__base_url.description: Base URL for the application, including protocol, hostname and port. e.g., https://example.com or http://example.com:8080. Avoid trailing slash.
